original_title: Mephedrone Drug Seized From Moldovan National In Weligama Confirmed By Government Analysts
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Government analysts has confirmed that the substances seized from a Moldovan national in Weligama is the dangerous drug Mephedrone. The Government Analyst's Department stated that the relevant report has been handed over to the police.Meanwhile, the National Dangerous Drugs Control Board had also confirmed yesterday that the seized substances were Mephedrone.
